rows.label: tlk70000041_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Since we sent those supplies to the
militia, our policy towards it has
changed a bit, too.

rows.label: tlk70000041_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Now the king says we should open the
warehouse doors to anyone in need.

rows.label: tlk70000041_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Let me know if the militia ever runs
short of food or medicine or anything
again, yeah?

rows.label: tlk70000041_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Hey, did you see that? I... I think I was
just doing some work for once! Phew.
Really takes it out of ya. I need a nap.
